synopsis.text: With the release of the third volume of Ikoku Meiro no Croisée's Blu-ray & DVD, fans can look forward to an exclusive bonus: episode 4.5. This special episode was previously available for a limited time on ShowTime, the anime's official streaming site. In this episode, Yune is captivated by a bohemian singer named Anne, who performs Japanese songs. Alice, intrigued by Anne's talent, extends an invitation for her to perform at one of her parties, with Yune joining in the act. The performance is a resounding success, leading to a heartfelt promise between Alice and Yune to meet again in the future. Don't miss out on this enchanting tale of friendship and music in Ikoku Meiro no Croisée.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
